docs.title: Hi, I'm Seth Palkki 👋
docs.text:
Welcome to my portfolio. I'm an electrical engineer with hands-on experience in power systems, software, and data. This site houses my resume and a curated list of projects.

This site is built with MkDocs + Material (Python) and deployed for free on GitHub Pages.

docs.title: Highlights
docs.text:
• ⚡ Power & Energy Systems (OpenDSS, PowerWorld)
  • 🐍 Python (Flask/FastAPI), SQL
  • 📱 Flutter + REST APIs
  • 🎓 MSE/BSE Electrical Engineering

docs.title: Resume
docs.text:
• Download a copy of my resume here (PDF)

You can also embed the PDF (some browsers will preview it):

docs.title: Projects
docs.text:
A selection of projects. Use the template to add more.

  • GridScout — Mobile + backend system for utility grid mapping and OpenDSS updates. Flutter, Flask, MySQL, AWS S3, OpenDSS.
  • Relay Settings Helper — Calculators for transformer protection settings and coordination. Python, Jupyter.

Start from the Project Template.

docs.title: Project Title
docs.text: Stack: Python, Flask, MySQL Role: Lead developer Dates: 2024–2025 Repo:

docs.text: One paragraph that explains the problem, your approach, and the outcome.
